title: Hello, World
content:
# Welcome to my blog

This is my first post on the new site. I built this using a simple **GitHub-powered CMS** that lets me write in Markdown and publish instantly.

## How it works

The editor commits posts directly to the GitHub repository, which triggers a Vercel rebuild. Within about 30 seconds, the new content is live.

## Features

- Markdown support with live preview
- Image uploads
- Clean, minimal design
- No database required

> The best writing tools get out of your way and let you focus on the words.

More posts coming soon!
